data.description:
A VR drum simulator. Bring a customizable drum kit with you anywhere you and your Meta Quest go. Play anytime, practice or work on a drum cover to your own favorite music.

Play the app loud, or use the headphones, virtually silent for others.

In-game Quest file browser .MP3/.OGG audio player. Play your own music files directly within your Quest headset. (Storage/SD)

Position your drum hardware. Modify each drums sound by using different drum heads, cymbals, hi-hats etc.

Tenor Drum Mode:
Tenor drum harness and tenor drums included. Used in marching bands and live/sporting events.

- Position your hardware
- Pressure sensitive physics
- Bass and hi-hat foot pedals (VR Controller)
- Bass and hi-hat foot pedals (Connect USB Pedal/Gamepad)
- Multiple locations
- Save your drum kit layout and return to it
- Change drums sounds and  look
- Play .MP3/.OGG audio files

Sounds Hardware Included:
7 snare drums, 5 bass drums, also an amped bass drum, 5 crash cymbals, 2 ride cymbals, 3 splash cymbals, tom drums 6", 8", 10", 12", 14". A roto tom rack 6", 8", 10" roto toms, 4 different hi-hats (rock, 50's, metal trash etc), china cymbals, dry ride/crash, custom china stack, mounted tambourine, steelpan drum and more.

Test Included:
- Liv.tv
- Note Highway Mini Game 
- Add/Play Custom Drum Charts

Note: 
Music must be added manually.
